answers.answer: Hello,This transparent fluid is normal prostatic secretions which are produced when one is excited or before ejaculation. There is no harm in it and it is completely normal.I sincerely hope that helps. Take care.

Hello,Soft and weak erection can be due to erectile dysfunction. The causes are many like diabetes, depression, autonomic nervous system problem, excessive alcohol ingestion or tobacco smoking etc. You may need to consult your doctor to see which amongst these causes are responsible for your problem.I sincerely hope that helps. Take care.
